name: compounding-engineering
description: AI-powered development tools that get smarter with every use. Make each unit of engineering work easier than the last. Includes 17 specialized agents, 6 commands, and 3 git worktree skills.

code-review.name: kieran-rails-reviewer
code-review.description: Reviews Rails code with strict quality standards so that future PRs can build on higher quality foundations, reducing technical debt and rework

code-review.name: kieran-typescript-reviewer
code-review.description: Reviews TypeScript code with high quality bar so that type safety and patterns established today prevent bugs and confusion tomorrow

code-review.name: kieran-python-reviewer
code-review.description: Reviews Python code with strict quality standards so that Pythonic patterns and type hints make future code more maintainable

code-review.name: dhh-rails-reviewer
code-review.description: Provides brutally honest Rails review from DHH philosophy so that Rails conventions are reinforced and complexity is eliminated before it spreads

code-review.name: code-simplicity-reviewer
code-review.description: Simplifies code using YAGNI principles so that each line removed makes the codebase easier to understand and maintain for all future work

architecture.name: architecture-strategist
architecture.description: Analyzes system design and architectural decisions so that changes align with established patterns, making future integrations and extensions easier

architecture.name: pattern-recognition-specialist
architecture.description: Identifies design patterns and anti-patterns so that good patterns are reinforced and bad patterns are eliminated before they replicate

quality.name: performance-oracle
quality.description: Identifies performance issues early so that subsequent optimizations are based on data and systems scale smoothly as they grow

quality.name: security-sentinel
quality.description: Detects security vulnerabilities before deployment so that each security improvement raises the baseline for all future code

quality.name: data-integrity-guardian
quality.description: Reviews database migrations and data operations so that data integrity is protected and future migrations can build on solid foundations

analysis.name: git-history-analyzer
analysis.description: Analyzes git history and code evolution so that lessons from past changes inform better decisions for future work

analysis.name: repo-research-analyst
analysis.description: Analyzes repository structure and organization so that existing patterns are understood and followed, maintaining consistency

workflow.name: best-practices-researcher
workflow.description: Researches and gathers best practices so that proven patterns are discovered once and applied consistently across all future work

workflow.name: framework-docs-researcher
workflow.description: Researches framework documentation so that correct patterns are understood once and reused, preventing repeated research

workflow.name: feedback-codifier
workflow.description: Converts review feedback into reusable patterns so that similar issues are prevented in future work through systematic knowledge capture

workflow.name: pr-comment-resolver
workflow.description: Addresses code review comments systematically so that feedback is incorporated quickly and patterns are learned for future PRs

documentation.name: every-style-editor
documentation.description: Edits content to match Every.to style guide so that each piece maintains consistency and the style becomes internalized over time

workflow.name: plan
workflow.description: Creates structured plans with research and references so that work execution is efficient and learnings are captured for future planning

workflow.name: work
workflow.description: Executes plans in isolated worktrees while capturing learnings so that future work builds on documented patterns and parallel development is enabled

workflow.name: review
workflow.description: Performs multi-agent code review in isolated worktrees so that quality standards compound and issues are caught before they spread

workflow.name: triage
workflow.description: Systematically organizes findings into actionable todos so that work is prioritized and context is preserved for efficient execution

utility.name: generate_command
utility.description: Generates custom command templates so that new workflows can be codified and reused, expanding the plugin's capabilities

utility.name: resolve_todo_parallel
utility.description: Resolves multiple todos in parallel so that backlog items are cleared efficiently and learnings from each resolution inform others

git-workflow.name: git-worktree-create
git-workflow.description: Creates isolated git worktrees for PRs, feature branches, or experiments with smart defaults and best practices

git-workflow.name: git-worktree-manage
git-workflow.description: Manages worktree lifecycle: listing active worktrees, inspecting status, removing completed work, and pruning references

git-workflow.name: git-worktree-best-practices
git-workflow.description: Provides naming conventions, organizational patterns, and workflow guidance aligned with compounding engineering principles
